NeurIPS Workshop Paper

31 Oct 2019

We are excited to be presenting some of our results about the generative properties of predictive coding networks at a workshop of the conference Neural Information Processing Systems 2019 (NeurIPS). The workshop is entitled Perception as Generative Reasoning.

You can see the paper here.
